ComicInfo.Title: Fleeing the Foreign Legion; Baby One-Shots; Bigfoots; One Fine Day in Holland; Harlem Nughts; Ghastly Garageful; Cracked Mirrors II; Advertisement for the Cracked Phone Number!; Doggie Hoser M.D.; One Fine Day Whilst Walking; Meet the People; TV Sets for Watching Specific TV Shows!; Cracked Mini-TV Tube; Critic's Corner!; Sabotage in the 1990's; The Bunisher; Numbskulls in the News; Cracked to the Future Part II; One Hot Muggy Day in the Jungle
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hudd and Dini flee from the Foreign Legion and try to hide in a cooking pot but the guard finds them.
Sylvester has been kidnapped and will be killed unless enough Cracked fans call in to save him!
The New Kids on the Block are put to death.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:43:17. [Issue ID 250615]
